website_summaries.verdict: A well-made 4G LTE product with all the convenience of a prepaid plan.
pros: The 13-megapixel camera gives high-res quality to your mobile photos
The front-facing camera features wide-angle capability
Includes a SIM card for free when you purchase
cons: Only works on the Tracfone network

customer_reviews.title: Hooked up on straight talk no problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. We use straight talk service and had no trouble with getting this up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Rashse hartness

customer_reviews.title: visual voicemail app does not work
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that LG and Tracfone do not offer any support for fixing this application that does not work and is broken. When I call the phone number and it goes to voicemail which works but the problem is when I turn on the phone and press the app which it tries to load and then says that it ran into a problem and if this persists please contact customer service. But I do not know which customer service to call? How could they deliver a product without making sure that all of the applications work before selling it to the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: timelord

customer_reviews.title: Great prepaid phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the stylo 4. I have one for my primary phone. I got this one for my backup. I've had tracfone for 15 years and wanted a good phone. The signal is good and the phone is easy to use. Great service and shipping from seller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Mullens

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Very Good Phone, The battery life is Fantastic, Picture Quality is Great, Very good Price, I tried a $800 iphone did not like it.
customer_reviews.author: VIRGINIA L SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price for a cheap phone
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy with LG stylo 4. I was an owner of the stylo LG2. And had the phone for 4 years unfortunately the Stylo LG 4 does not stand up to its family before them. It freezes constantly the plastic covering is very cheap and cracks very easy. Sound is low and the actual screan seams to be not as clear as the ones before. The price was cheaper. Then 4 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Tracfone!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Stylo 4. It is the first Tracfone that I have owned that actually gives system updates. I have had 3 so far. The battery life is very good as is the picture
customer_reviews.author: Janet Britton

customer_reviews.title: Locked to Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Locked to Tracphone for 12 months. This LG Stylo 4 only has 16gb storage compared to other models of same phone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ventimiglia

customer_reviews.title: SOUND BAD-Get stylo 3 INSTEAD
customer_reviews.text: CRAP- TRACFONE upon the mere mention of defects HUNG UP on me. Tried to call back for better cs rep-tracfone dropped my DIALING calls to not let me get through! Instant -after dial/before pick up- disconnects! No way to get warranty! 6mo old, used very little by a shut in. Amazon promised no "restock fee" then I got charged one. Khen on chat was horrible..Tara very nice..3rd played stunningly stupid stupid..but the zizo military case was great..sound is too low..hard to hear..hard to hold..too narrow...nothing like stylo 3...which I have and really like. Sd slot was unusable..wish I never got it..must of been xmas rush junk..SUPER SUCKS MUSICALLY..HORRIBLY 👎
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: TracFone LG Stylo 4 4G LTE Prepaid Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this phone, especially the 6.2 display screen, no complaints. It's a keeper 100%, recommend this phone to senior's like myself who don't need hundreds of app's.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Angel, great time playing these games

customer_reviews.title: Poor packing .All parts not included a charge wire not charger
customer_reviews.text: said it had a SIM. it did not.came wrapped in bubble wrap inside of a sandwich bag with a sticker that said SIM included but not.Then in direct sunlight found a crack in the screen bottom right corner not visible on first look. Sad had to send back to seller who said it was good Baby By it Now Company..Descritin said good was not. Sent back
customer_reviews.author: Waynebumbalough

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Tracfone I ever had. Crazy advance for economy phone. I couldn’t believe how many features it had. I love how you can split the screen in half and have two apps visible but can only run one at a time, going back-and-forth between the two. I love this phone but I broke the screen. I would buy the phone again or fix the screen because this phone is amazing. Definitely need a case if you buy it. Screen cracked on the first drop.
customer_reviews.author: Seandig

customer_reviews.title: Not enough hard drive space for aps
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this phone. I've had it since April 2020, but it has become a brick because the 16 gb of hard drive space is full of the operating system and one application. Because the phone will not update, it will not operate as it should. Save your money and get a phone with at least 32 gb of space. If you're looking at Tracfone for the first time, I've used it since 2008 and will continue to use the service. However, this phone is not worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: loved the look of phone
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use it yet but i do love the look of the phone and the features ect...and was a great price and value would recommend it i will get back to u on how it is when i get it all hooked up and using it have to call tracfone to transfer it,so i'll get back to u later on the rest of the review of cell phone.PS i got it hooked up yesterday and i love it this is a must have phone,you did it again LG love your products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: comparable to the much more expensive cell phones on the market as of July 2019. Great resolution, audio and speed. Only drawback is battery life. Mainly use phone for Web, email, photos and texts. Battery drains to 20% in about 36 hours.
customer_reviews.author: larry mistick

customer_reviews.title: Case is more than expected
customer_reviews.text: The case is beautiful and fits my hand very well.
customer_reviews.author: Warren M.

customer_reviews.title: Works with Straightalk..
customer_reviews.text: Out in the boonies though, nothing seems to work well -so if you are living in a rural area, below hills etc, you'll have a good phone but the service might be glitchy.
customer_reviews.author: Gidge

customer_reviews.title: Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: LoveTracfone. I have purchased 7 Tracfones for all my grandchildren ages ages 13-19. Love the fact you are not stuck in a monthly plan. My grands have learned to manage their minutes, data and texts. Only thing I have to purchase is the yearly fee of $99 for each phone. Very rarely have to purchase additional data, texts, minutes due to WiFi spots.
customer_reviews.author: Mgie

customer_reviews.title: Junk-wont turn on
customer_reviews.text: Phone came used and would not turn on. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Lied about wifi calling enabled!
customer_reviews.text: I'm beyond pissed off about this,I bought this phone after what I thought was a lot of research. The answered question by the seller say it's able to make wifi calls. It doesn't. Save your money if your looking to make them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A total lemon
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not work as a tracfoneactive. It rewuires a a srperste Internet provider. It requires an operator and incurrs ex6rs charges on credit csrd in order to make any call. No texting is possible Tracfone support is an endless ineffective loop with no access to a live person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone for Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This phone was east to setup out of the box. I was easily able to move my sim card from my old phone to the new one and worked right away. Easy to setup and easy to use. Big screen and no complaints. Its a nice phone for cheap prepaid service.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LG Quality & Value
customer_reviews.text: I have had previous LG phones and have been impressed with their ease of use. This phone is no exception. Tracfone choices are limited and initially got a Moto G7, but it was defective, so I got this LG instead. It was a good decision.
customer_reviews.author: AZ-Shooter

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it a bunch I just have to get use to it. This is the phone if you want a great camera. This one takes the best pictures and I love the photo shop that comes with it. I would buy another phone like this again.
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented deal
customer_reviews.text: This item was supposed to include a $50 gift card for Amazon. Neither Amazon nor Tracfone has sent me the info to receive the card. I have contacted both parties. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mizer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Its a wonderful upgrade from my lg fiesta that met a tragic end in my cats water dish. It takes amazing looking photos, love the do not disturb feature, the stylus is so convenient, and I love that it uses a usb c charger
customer_reviews.author: needmorebooks

customer_reviews.title: Solid Budget Andriod Phone
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life. Relatively new version of OS. Performance is pretty snappy. Camera is OK. No issues with activating via Tracfone website. Need to add your own SD card if your taking photos since the built in memory is small.
customer_reviews.author: Saifur Rahman

customer_reviews.title: No Airtime Bundle
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not come with a $40 Airtime Bundle or pin card. You get no airtime with this purchase. I contacted seller and they just said I could return it. No explanation. This is incorrect purchase information on seller’s description. It comes with NO airtime installed.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Bloatware not enough space
customer_reviews.text: Phone had lots of preinstalled apps that use up most of the space. We've added an SD card which we thought would help but nope
customer_reviews.author: Mone Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. I had the stylo 2 then 3 and now 4. Its large and the sylus is awesome. Never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberleigh S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. It’s a great phone
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal and birthday gift for my fiancé. He isn’t into technology much so he still uses tracfone. The battery life could be better but other than that. It’s been really good so far. It’s supper light weight and really nice deal too with the rebate gift card it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: good cell phone selection for a novice like myself
customer_reviews.text: this cell phone is by far one of the best I have ordered and used and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McDougall

customer_reviews.title: Best budget deal
customer_reviews.text: When I'm just sitting around the house and feel like shooting the breeze, I use this phone with an internet service to make calls. When I'm out and about, I carry this great looking and high functioning Stylo 4, that is probably not for a gamer, but is all you need for regular cell phone use.
customer_reviews.author: cehsr55

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Works great, little different from my other phone. But like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kara will

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WITH SAFELINK
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone.. It's huge! The battery holds well. It takes GOOD pictures!
customer_reviews.author: ERICA

customer_reviews.title: Too large for small hands
customer_reviews.text: This phone was too big to hold onto if you have small hands don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Lg 4 stylo
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, is huge but very light in the hand and the price can’t be beat. Received it fast, thank you Amazon Prime!❤️
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: I Had a number of phones and my number 1 pick i
customer_reviews.text: the one thing i was not happy with< on my bill is said $ 40.00 of air time bundle, Tracfone gave me nothing. Not a penny.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD  DAHL

customer_reviews.title: Works first couple of months then the problems start
customer_reviews.text: I have home Wi-Fi yet this phone will go off line in the middle of an action. For instance sharing a post on Facebook. Says try when back on line. This is my only phone so calling tracfone is useless because they want me to call from another phone so they can troubleshoot this one. Imbeciles. This is my only phone. Don't buy one. May seem great at first but it DOES NOT LAST.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Denison

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I use for work receiving calls to work & when working routes to use!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES H FOREMAN

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic smart phone but low cost
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty basic Android phone but that's all I need. It works well and service is reliable.
customer_reviews.author: eyesonlybob

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone...im on it all day and only have to plug it in to charge once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy correira

customer_reviews.title: very good for cheaper phone
customer_reviews.text: i bought this just incase of Emer. works great and fast
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for price.
customer_reviews.text: Large screen. Easy to use. Much nicer phone than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: what it does not do
customer_reviews.text: while it is over all 4 * ,I give 3* because it does not recognize 5 mh wyfi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Took me week to get used to the phone, but it's a great phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin*

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described on here. Awesome phone at an awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan D

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my phone. This is an upgrade from my last phone. I like the screen size and the many functions that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wasn't super impressed with is the camera and picture quality. Not the greatest but everything else I love.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Reames

customer_reviews.title: sound
customer_reviews.text: the sound not loud so you can hear like to returned
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic phone it's the biggest phone we've ever had the calls the Wi-Fi the pictures couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good size screen, easy to use, upgrading phones was easy.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN STASKO

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement phone and this is perfection. Straight out a box and swapped over my info. Simple
customer_reviews.author: Nakia

customer_reviews.title: Works but crashes sometimes
customer_reviews.text: It was good, but one day it crashed and stayed on the tracgine logo for about an hour
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyne krager

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Not all features
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy. Because it is a tracphone. Features that comes with a name carrier do not come with a tracphone.
customer_reviews.author: Heart. Transplant

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of minutes left from years of having a TracFone and like that I can buy a year's worth of time. I can have a smart phone for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: voice mail
customer_reviews.text: can not get it to work. tracfone does not help last one i talked to was rude
customer_reviews.author: devil

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Got my phone back after 3 weeks and is working now just wish it was a 5G type of phone.
customer_reviews.author: David Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great value&service
customer_reviews.text: Large screen...no problems to this point...only a few months but very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy H.

customer_reviews.title: Buy It Hurry
customer_reviews.text: Like slow phone's? Apps freezing? Horrible overall sound quilty? Then this phone might just be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good phone under $100.00
customer_reviews.text: Had a rebel 4 before, this phone is so much more. I wish the battery was replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert k.

customer_reviews.title: Not good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Font on phone is small for anyone with low vision.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: acting strange
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone and it worked flawlessly for 2weeks but now It won't load my apps, all I get is the loading "circle of death". I decided to re-start the phone and It worked perfectly but for a while. Now I find myself re-booting the phone 5-10 times a day. Not Normal..I really hate to return the phone but attempts to reach LG support is pointless. I carry premium anti-virus, Malwarebytes and a VPN so I doubt it is a virus. Very annoying but workable because I don't live on my phone like nerd america does. Any ideas out there?
customer_reviews.author: michaelblackford

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Still learning all the bits and pieces, but so far it is working just fine
customer_reviews.author: mmonty.

customer_reviews.title: A nice phone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the phone because of the screen size. I was having trouble seeing the older one. I had a LG33 and one of the features on it was 'scheduled texting'. However this one does not have that feature. I called LG and they said to try a different messaging service. I have tried them but found them not to be what I wanted. The message are for texting is too small and you can't scroll it to make sure the message is what you wanted. However other than that I do like the phone
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life, everything else great!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my phone a lot for work. I love this phone. Easy to use. Big touch screen. Battery life doesn't last all day. I didn't have to charge my old phone all day. I have to charge this one around noonish. The pen would work better for me on the top, not the bottom. Other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Windy StClair

customer_reviews.title: Get this one for the 32 GB of internal storage...plus you can add a card.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is "tinny" as all get out. No RCA jack but I use external "Bluetooth" speakers and the sound is superb. I actually upgraded from a Stylo 2 thinking I could use the STYLO 4 for Android Pay. Guess what? NOT SUPPORTED
customer_reviews.author: MR. BILL

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: The camera on this phone is why I bought it. It seriously is amazing. Worth the price just for the camera alone. Battery life is very good. Some people have remarked at how big my phone is now, but I don't think its too big and I never have trouble sticking it my jeans pocket.
customer_reviews.author: fwa

customer_reviews.title: A great phone!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves my phone so much that she begged for one just like it. We have her setup on a tracfone plan so this phone was as easy as could be to switch to. Great phone, cameras, battery life & ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how fast I got this one. Great phone (LG Stylo 4, it's all I need) , easy to activate and use. The bundle deal worked just as stated, after activation, there it was in my account. I am impressed with the phone and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Kenn L

customer_reviews.title: Return Shipping?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and see that there is a dark spot in the upper right hand corner of the screen. Therefore, it is defective. THEY WANT ME TO PAY FOR RETURN SHIPPING!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisR

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Amazing camera! Biggest screen size for your buck. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Looks like new
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as refurbished. I figured save a few bucks and deal with it being a little worn.I can't find any scratches or anything wrong.Looks brand new at a used price.
customer_reviews.author: HOOVER

customer_reviews.title: very nice would buy again
customer_reviews.text: very nice it's ok for someone on a budget would buy again
customer_reviews.author: menzola  burford

customer_reviews.title: Love my Stylo 4
customer_reviews.text: So glad I went with this phone. Easy to use and the battery lasts for days! I only use it for basics. Calls, texts, online. Never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kariboo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Great phone!! I received the $50 gift card as well!! So the phone only cost me $38!!!! Awesome bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: lahti

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this phone. Large size easy to see, very responsive, quick in functions, even re-charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Didnt come with stylus pen, after 3 months of having it, it shut down and will not come back on!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Druin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy built, great size ,
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have owned in a long time. It's a great size and with case I ordered separately it's very sturdy . it's easy to use and battery life is better then phones I have paid much more for and I love it more then other much more expensive phones I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: A. McElhany

customer_reviews.title: very good phone and sound on calls
customer_reviews.text: I don't use a cell phone very often but this one is really great at the other things I use a cell phone for. Thd camera has an excellent picture.
customer_reviews.author: Helen A. Ostrander

customer_reviews.title: Gift for wife
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: mark a jones

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints after two months of use. Battery life is good. Last me all day. Charging is fast even without a fast charger. Like I said, no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

product_meta.title: TracFone Carrier-Locked LG Stylo 4 4G LTE Prepaid Smartphone - Black - 16GB - Sim Card Included - CDMA
product_meta.description: Style:Device OnlyStay connected with the Tracfone LG Stylo 4 4G LTE prepaid smartphone. Capture memories with the 13MP camera/5MP front-facing camera/video recorder and bring them to life on the touchscreen display. This prepaid smartphone's wide Dimension ensures it fits well in your Palms for better handling. Running Oreo, the Android smartphone features a 1. 8GHz octal-core processor, leading to better performance and quicker in-device communication. The Bluetooth V4. 2 ensures your device is Compatible with a broad range of devices while providing faster data transfer. With a powerful battery, the Tracfone LG Stylo 4 L713 4G LTE prepaid smartphone ensures long talk hours and standby time. The Wi-Fi and GPS capabilities of the device allow you to explore the world around you and when you're looking for new fun, you can easily find something out of the 1, 000, 000+ apps available on Google play.
feature_bullets: 6.2" HD Screen; 1.8 GHz Octa-Core processor; Android 8.1 Oreo
13MP Camera/5 MP Wide Angle Front Facing Camera; Internal memory 16 GB; supports Micro SD memory card up to 2 TB (not included)
4G LTE; Wi-Fi Connectivity – 802.11 b/g/n; Bluetooth 4.2 wireless technology; Accelerometer

Note: This phone is carrier locked; Customers must have had their locked device activated on service for no fewer than 12 months, redeemed air time cards in no fewer than 12 months, and not have had their telephone number recycled or ported.Rear Camera resolution:Up to 4160 x 3120 pixels
Unlimited Talk, Text and Data plans starting as low as $20/month

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars266 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: User Manual, Wall Charger, Phone, SIM
